scripts.all: yarn run generate_dotenv && concurrently  --kill-others-on-fail --names HASURA,HASURA_CONSOLE,NGROK,SLS "make hasura_up_delay" "make hasura_console_delay" "make ngrok_silent" "make sls_local"
scripts.generate_dotenv: make generate_dotenv_files && make generate_dotenv_files && make generate_dotenv_files && make generate_dotenv_files
